title: Dramatic Reading Scene and Story Collection, Volume 004
description:
Librivox readers present a collection of their favorite chapters and short stories, with the original author’s words all brought to life with different reader voices for each character in our popular Dramatic Reading style. This volume includes readings from Beatrix Potter, Gustave Flaubert, L. M. Montgomery, A. A. Milne, Rev Charles S. Wing, Henry Slesar, Emma-Lindsay Squier, and Saki. - Summary by ToddHW

NOTE: A. A. Milne died in 1956 and Slesar died in 2002. Their stories are not PD for readers in Europe and/or Australia, and other countries which observe copyright of author's death +70 years.
